description: Character must include a selected race.
llm_prompt: Check if the character description clearly states a chosen race (e.g., Elf, Human, Dwarf, etc.). If not, respond 'Missing race.'

description: Character must include a selected class from the official 5e list.
llm_prompt: Does the character specify a class from the official Dungeons & Dragons 5th edition list? Valid classes are: Artificer, Barbarian, Bard, Cleric, Druid, Fighter, Monk, Paladin, Ranger, Rogue, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard. Respond 'Invalid class' if it's not one of these.
Check if the alignment of the character is mentioned (e.g., Lawful Good, Chaotic Neutral). If not, respond 'Missing alignment.'

description: Character must define ability scores between 3 and 18.
llm_prompt: Verify that the six ability scores (STR, DEX, CON, INT, WIS, CHA) are present and each has a value between 3 and 18. Respond 'Invalid scores' if any are missing or outside this range.

description: Character must include background and personality traits.
llm_prompt: Check if the character background and personality traits (such as bonds, flaws, ideals) are described.

description: Character description must be at least 200 words.
Character must belong to a valid 5e race.
llm_prompt: Check if the character's race is one of the official Dungeons & Dragons 5e races: Dragonborn, Dwarf, Elf, Gnome, Half-Elf, Half-Orc, Halfling, Human, Tiefling, Aasimar, Firbolg, Goblin, Goliath, Kenku, Tabaxi, Triton, Yuan-ti. If not, respond 'Invalid race'.
